column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////All we wanted on our recent trip to Chicago was the deep dish pizza. Lou's was recommended by multiple people. When we walked in there was an hour wait
column2: but the restaurant takes your pizza order to get things started. The bar is lively so you can grab a drink while you wait. We were seated earlier than expected and promptly served. The pizza was delicious! The best part was the butter crust which I highly recommend. Overall
column3: if you are vacationing and looking to grab a deep dish head here!
